description:
After passing hard time in Alcatraz jail, you victoriously escaped from high security crime patrol squad cell. It’s your time to take vengeance from crooked cops on heist modes. Get inside exotic cars and drive recklessly to escape police chasing car in spectacular city. Commit bank robbery and multiple street crimes to get rich. Endure deathly flails, chaotic hindrances and other heart-wrenching hurdles on gritty roads to escape from police cars. Maintain a peculiar distance from police cars and drive all the way to safe house in amazing escape game. Show guts for grand gangster theft and intriguing driving missions in suburban town. Drive sports car from perilous maze of modern city streets after robbing gold and diamonds from big bank. Drive through breathtaking environments and obstacles to escape from police cars. Complete gangster escape missions from police car chase before they caught you again. Driving auto cars, evading cops after bank robbery, racing through destructive obstacles and dangerous roads! Have enough guts to rise the top of criminal piles in crazy police car escape plan game?

Features:
10 challenging police car escape levels
Real driver skills with amazing escape plan & police car chase
Sports cars and racing auto vehicles for insane driving mania
Incredible controls for ruthless car driving in fast city
Realistic open world environment for mafia driving missions
High quality 3D graphics & immersive gameplay
